titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Radius of Arab-American Writers, Inc. records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Radius of Arab-American Writers, Inc. records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Radius of Arab-American Writers, Inc. (RAWI) was formed in 1992 with goals such as encouraging Arab-American youth to write, offering a professional network, and urging members to publish their work.
archdesc.scopecontent: Consists primarily of newsletters and director's letters. Also includes membership directories and conference programs. Materials collected by Barbara Nimri Aziz, one of the organization's founders.
